text: Andhala'o mate, langada'o mate, bimara vyakti mate ane tamara mate ko'i vandho nathi ke tame potana gharo manthi kha'i lo athava potana pitana gharamam athava potani matana gharamam, athava potana bha'i'ona gharamam athava potani bahenona gharamam athava potana kaka'ona gharomam, athava potani pho'i'ona gharomam athava potana mamana gharomam athava potani masi'ona gharamam, athava te gharo mam jemana malika tame cho, athava potana dostona gharomam. Tamara mate temam pana ko'i papa nathi ke tame sau sathe besine khavanum kha'o, athava alaga besine, basa! Jyare tame gharomam praveso to potana gharavala'one salama kaho, te bhala'ini du'a che, je pavitra che, allaha ta'ala taraphathi avatarita thayela che, avi ja rite allaha ta'ala spasta rite potana adesonum varnana kari rahyo che, jethi tame samaji lo
